attributes.action: Ask the Secretary of State to call In TESCO/Everton Planning Application in Kirkby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kirkby has been starved of investment for many years. We have now been advised that there are two options to redevelop Kirkby, Tesco/Everton or Development Securities.

Knowsley Council are trying to change the Unitary Development Plan, adopted June 06, citing the failure of this plan to allow an Interim Policy Statement to be drafted. The change of use of land from recreational/educational/greenspace should be stopped and land left for residents to continue to enjoy.

Despite the objections to the IPS, Knowsley Council have still continued with their allegiance towards Tesco/Everton, we believe that all parties should be given a fair hearing.  

The Dev Sec option meets all the requirements of the current UDP and will regenerate Kirkby as a town.

The consultation and decison making process,to date, has not been even handed and advised all residents of all the facts.  A town of 42,500 pop. does not need one of the largest supermarkets in Britain.

We don't need to be thrust up the retail heirarchy whereby all people will want to do is shop in Kirkby, not live.

We urge all supporters of democracy who want to see Kirkby residents treated fairly to sign this petition.
